text: aur behasht va dozakh ke daramiyaan ek had faasil hai aur kuchh log aaraaf par hogen jo har shakhs ko (behishtee ho ya jahannumee) unakee peshaanee se pahachaan legen aur vah jannat vaalon ko aavaaz degen ki tum par salaam ho ya (aaraaf vaale) log abhee daakhile jannat nahin hue hain magar vah tamanna zaroor rakhate hain
